mapper.sql: id, register_id, put_id, insert_time, delete_id, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT starch_organization_put.* FROM starch_organization_put left JOIN starch_register_put ON starch_organization_put.oid = starch_register_put.put_id and starch_organization_put.delete_id = 0 where starch_register_put.register_id = #{s} and starch_register_put.delete_id = 0;
